active_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]20%[-] chance to shock target for [FFD428]1[-] turn(s). Shocked foes cannot act and have reduced defense.

active_skill.description: Shoots a beam of plasma, damaging all enemies.
active_skill.name: Plasma Beam

super_skill.description: Smashes the ground when own HP drops below a certain level, damaging all enemies and lowering their attack for 2 turns.
super_skill.name: Thunder Slam

super_effect.name: Attack Down

default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]60%[-] chance to reduce the enemy's defense for [FFD428]2[-] turn(s).
default_effect.name: Defense Down

default_skill.description: Brings its hand blade crashing down upon a single target.
default_skill.name: Eliminate
